newsitem.title: ITALY: SOCCER-VERONA FINED FOR RACIST TAUNTS FROM FANS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-VERONA FINED FOR RACIST TAUNTS FROM FANS.

text.p: Serie A side Verona were fined 20 million lire ($13,000) on Wednesday for racist chants by some of their fans during last Sunday's 2-1 home win against Roma.
The Italian League said its sporting judge had imposed the penalty after supporters "chanted slogans of a clearly racist significance throughout the match against a player of the opposing side".
It did not identify the target of the taunts. Roma have several foreign players.
